net.viktorc.detroid.framework.validation

Class SearchTestSuite

  • Object
    • SearchTestSuite

  • public class SearchTestSuite
extends Object
    An implementation for an EPD test suite for sanity checks and the rough estimation of the tactical strength of a chess engine. Each instance has a name and holds a list of EPDRecord instances.
    Author:
    Viktor

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String BEST_MOVE_OP_CODE 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SearchTestSuite(String name, String testSuiteFilePath)
      Parses the EPD records in the specified file and holds them in a list.

      Returns the name of the test suite.
      List<EPDRecord> getRecords()
      Returns the EPDRecord records held in the test suite.
      static boolean searchTest(UCIEngine engine, ControllerEngine controllerEngine, EPDRecord record, long timePerPos)
      Searches the position defined in the EPDRecord record for the specified amount of time using the provided engine and returns if the engine found any one of the best moves noted in the record.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SearchTestSuite

        public SearchTestSuite(String name,
                       String testSuiteFilePath)
                throws IOException
        Parses the EPD records in the specified file and holds them in a list.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the test suite.
        testSuiteFilePath - The path to the file holding the EPDRecord records.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the file does not exist or cannot be read.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Returns the name of the test suite.
        Returns:
        The name of the test suite.

      • getRecords

        public List<EPDRecord> getRecords()
        Returns the EPDRecord records held in the test suite.
        Returns:

      • searchTest

        public static boolean searchTest(UCIEngine engine,
                                 ControllerEngine controllerEngine,
                                 EPDRecord record,
                                 long timePerPos)
                          throws Exception
        Searches the position defined in the EPDRecord record for the specified amount of time using the provided engine and returns if the engine found any one of the best moves noted in the record.
        Parameters:
        engine - The engine to test.
        controllerEngine - The controller engine.
        record - The EPDRecord record specifying the position and the best move(s).
        timePerPos - How long the engine should search the position in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        Whether the engine found any one of the best moves.
        Throws:
        Exception - If the engine initialization fails.
